title: Reynoe 12 Inch Silver Aluminum Frame Wall Clock with Thermometer Hygrometer Battery Operated Silent Movement Decorative for Home
features: 【Silent Movement】Quiet sweep and precise quartz movements to guarantee accurate time, ensure a good sleeping and working environment.
【Thermometer & Humidity】Our wall clock with thermometer and hygrometer function,built-in sensor to automatically measures Indoor/outdoor temperature and humidity.
【Brushed Silver Frame】Size: 11.8" in dia. x 1.7" thick with bright frame. Brushed aluminum frame adds style to any decor.
【Easy to Use】Hooks included with the clock which ensures easy installation. Powered by 1 AA battery(Not included), Brand New battery can last about 1 year.
【Full Satisfaction Guarantee】One year manufacture warranty. If you are unhappy with this clock for any reason, contact us for a full refund or replacement.
description: A simple yet number look with a silver aluminum frame and a traditional circular contour. Reynoe  wall clock adopts a refined quartz movement that helps you keep track of time more accurately. Large white numbers and hands in green background and front clear glass cover guarantees perfect view, even from a distance.
Material: Aluminum Frame + HD Glass + Plastic
1 x Reynoe 12 Inches Aluminum Wall  Clock
If you have any issue, please feel free to let us know and we are ALWAYS behind our products. Thank you for your support.
